Package org.keycloak.validate.validators

Class NotBlankValidator

java.lang.Object
org.keycloak.validate.validators.NotBlankValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Provider, ProviderFactory<Validator>, SimpleValidator, Validator, ValidatorFactory
public class NotBlankValidator extends Object implements SimpleValidator
Validate that value exists and is not empty nor blank. Supports String and collection of Strings as input. For collection of Strings input has to contain at least one element and it have to be non-blank to satisfy this validation. If collection contains something else than String, or if even one String in it is blank, then this validation fails.
See Also:
  • NotEmptyValidator
